text: Lee Ann Remick (December 14, 1935 â€“ July 2, 1991) was an American actress. She was born in Quincy, Massachusetts. She played the female lead in Anatomy of a Murder, Days of Wine and Roses and The Omen. Remick won a Golden Globe award in 1973. In 1975 she won a Golden Globe Award and a BAFTA award. Remick died of kidney cancer in Los Angeles, California. == Other websites == * Category:1935 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Deaths from kidney cancer Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:People from Quincy, Massachusetts
title: Lee Remick
